LightningComponentBundle.description: DFJ Journal Form Component - Two-tier permission-based DocFab form selection

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Custom label for the button. Defaults to 'Open Journal Form' if not specified.

property.name: openBehavior
property.label: Open Behavior
property.description: Choose modal (default), newTab, or inline to render DocFab.

property.name: recordModelIds
property.label: Record Model IDs
property.description: Comma-separated list of allowed DocFab Record Model IDs (e.g., 160, 54, 22). Users must have Custom Permission to see each option.

property.name: formNumbers
property.label: Form Numbers
property.description: Comma-separated list of allowed DocFab Form Numbers (e.g., 17, 51, 22). Users must have Custom Permission to see each option. Required.

property.name: allowMultipleDocFabJournals
property.label: Allow Multiple DocFabricator Journals (Lead only)
property.description: If true, allow creating/opening different record models per Lead.

property.name: recordModelId
property.label: [DEPRECATED] Record Model ID
property.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'Record Model IDs' instead. Legacy single record model ID.

property.name: formUuid
property.label: [DEPRECATED] Form UUID
property.description: DEPRECATED - Use 'Form Numbers' instead. Legacy single form UUID.

property.name: formTypeUniqueName
property.label: [DEPRECATED] Form Type Unique Name
property.description: DEPRECATED - No longer used in new architecture.
